name: Battle of Reality
description:
We are Orange Coffee Studio : Presenting "Battle of reality !!"

It's supposed to be a horror game, but we don't know what happened !!

R, G, B - Channels:

R -> here if you stayed enough, you will rewarded with a block you can't see !

B -> here the monster is faster, but you can see the blocks

G -> here you can't see the blocks and you can't see the monster, it's place to reset

How to play:

W A S D - To move

Mouse - To control camera

Mouse left click - To put block

Mouse right click - To hold block

1 2 3 - To change camera channel
